code:
flowchart TD
  %% Workspace and Build
  subgraph Build["Build System"]
    CLI["Terminal / colcon"]
    Xacro["xacro"]
    URDF["URDF (robot model)"]
    CLI --> Xacro --> URDF
  end

  %% Launch system
  subgraph Launch["Launch System"]
    Display["display.launch.py"]
    Spawn["spawn_sim.launch.py"]
    CLI --> Display
    CLI --> Spawn
  end

  %% RViz Stack
  subgraph RViz["RViz Stack"]
    RSP["robot_state_publisher"]
    JSP["joint_state_publisher"]
    RV["RViz"]
    Display --> RSP --> RV
    Display --> JSP --> RV
  end

  %% Gazebo Stack
  subgraph Sim["Gazebo Stack"]
    Gazebo["Gazebo"]
    Model["Spawned Robot"]
    Scan["/scan"]
    Odom["/odom"]
    Cmd["/cmd_vel"]
    Spawn --> Gazebo --> Model
    Model --> Scan
    Model --> Odom
    Cmd --> Model
  end

  %% Shared topics
  RV --> Scan
  RV --> Odom
